name: Verify that the homepage loads successfully
description: Verify that the homepage loads successfully and contains expected elements like search box and content area.
steps: Navigate to the OpenCart homepage URL.
Check that the page title is not empty.
Verify that the search box is displayed.
Verify that the content area is displayed.
expectedResult: Homepage loads successfully with all key elements present and visible.

name: Verify product search functionality
description: Verify that users can search for products using the search box and relevant results are displayed.
steps: Navigate to the OpenCart homepage.
Enter search term 'phone' in the search box.
Click on the search button or press Enter.
Wait for search results page to load.
Verify that search results contain the search term or product listings.
expectedResult: Search results page loads and displays relevant products based on the search term.

name: Verify add to cart functionality
description: Verify that users can add products to the shopping cart from product pages.
steps: Navigate to the OpenCart homepage.
Navigate to a product category by clicking on a category link.
Select a product by clicking on it.
Wait for the product page to load.
Click on the 'Add to Cart' button.
Verify that the product is added to the cart through success message or cart icon update.
expectedResult: Product is successfully added to the cart with confirmation message or cart icon update.

name: Verify user login functionality
description: Verify that users can log in with valid credentials and access their account area.
steps: Navigate to the OpenCart homepage.
Click on 'My Account' dropdown.
Select 'Login' from the dropdown menu.
Enter valid email address and password.
Click on the login button.
Verify that login is successful and user is redirected to account area.
expectedResult: User is successfully logged in and redirected to account area with account information visible.

name: Verify add to wishlist functionality
description: Verify that logged-in users can add products to their wishlist.
steps: Login to a user account.
Navigate to a product page.
Click on the 'Add to Wish List' button.
Verify success message or navigate to wishlist page to confirm product was added.
expectedResult: Product is successfully added to the wishlist with confirmation message or visible in wishlist page.

name: Verify remove from wishlist functionality
description: Verify that logged-in users can remove products from their wishlist.
steps: Login to a user account.
Add a product to the wishlist.
Navigate to the wishlist page.
Click on the 'Remove' button for the product.
Verify that the product is removed from the wishlist.
expectedResult: Product is successfully removed from the wishlist with confirmation message or no longer visible in wishlist page.

name: Verify admin login functionality
description: Verify that administrators can log in to the admin panel with valid credentials.
steps: Navigate to the OpenCart admin login page.
Enter valid admin username and password.
Click on the login button.
Verify that login is successful and admin is redirected to dashboard.
expectedResult: Admin is successfully logged in and redirected to dashboard with dashboard information visible.

name: Verify admin logout functionality
description: Verify that administrators can log out from the admin panel.
steps: Login to the admin panel.
Click on the logout link in the navigation menu.
Verify that logout is successful and admin is redirected to login page.
expectedResult: Admin is successfully logged out and redirected to login page.

name: Verify product deletion functionality
description: Verify that administrators can delete products from the catalog.
steps: Login to the admin panel.
Navigate to Products page.
Search for a specific product.
Select the product and click Delete.
Confirm deletion in the alert dialog.
Verify success message for product deletion.
expectedResult: Product is successfully deleted with confirmation message.

name: Verify category creation functionality
description: Verify that administrators can create new product categories.
steps: Login to the admin panel.
Navigate to Categories page.
Click on Add New button.
Fill in category details in the General tab.
Fill in SEO details if needed.
Save the new category.
Verify success message for category creation.
expectedResult: Category is successfully created with confirmation message.
